title: Chili Crisp Sundae with Fish Sauce Caramel Brittle
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - 1 pint ice cream of your choice
- ¼ cup / 60ml Sichuan Chili Crisp (this page)
- 4 pieces Fish Sauce Caramel Brittle (recipe follows)
directions: 1. Scoop the ice cream into individual bowls and top with the chili crisp and caramel brittle.
